StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [InsertMIContractGoal]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @FiscalYear INT, @OrgID INT, @Contrac.ngMissionType VARCHAR (6), @January INT, @February INT, @March INT, @April INT, @May INT, @June INT, @July INT, @August INT, @September INT, @October INT, @November INT, @December INT, @UserLogin VARCHAR (15)) AS IF @Contrac.ngMissionType = 'MCRC' SET @Contrac.ngMissionType = 'CMC';
-- January IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM MCRISS.dbo.CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN_MICONTRACT WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID AND [MONTH_CODE] = 1 AND FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE] = @Contrac.ngMissionType) BEGIN UPDATE MCRISS.dbo.CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN_MICONTRACT SET [MISSION_VALUE] = @January, [USER_LOGIN] = @UserLogin, [UPDATE_DATE] = GetDate () WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID AND [MONTH_CODE] = 1 AND FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE] = @Contrac.ngMissionType END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO MCRISS.dbo.CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN_MICONTRACT ( [ORGANIZATION_ID], [FISCAL_YEAR], [MONTH_CODE], [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE], [MISSION_VALUE], [USER_LOGIN], [UPDATE_DATE]) VALUES (@OrgID, @FiscalYear, 1, @Contrac.ngMissionType, @January, @UserLogin, GetDate ()) END
-- February IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM MCRISS.dbo.CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN_MICONTRACT WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID AND [MONTH_CODE] = 2 AND FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE] = @Contrac.ngMissionType) BEGIN UPDATE MCRISS.dbo.CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN_MICONTRACT SET [MISSION_VALUE] = @February, [USER_LOGIN] = @UserLogin, [UPDATE_DATE] = GetDate () WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID AND [MONTH_CODE] = 2 AND FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE] = @Contrac.ngMissionType END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO MCRISS.dbo.CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN_MICONTRACT ( [ORGANIZATION_ID], [FISCAL_YEAR], [MONTH_CODE], [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE], [MISSION_VALUE], [USER_LOGIN], [UPDATE_DATE]) VALUES (@OrgID, @FiscalYear, 2, @Contrac.ngMissionType, @February, @UserLogin, GetDate ()) END
-- March IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM MCRISS.dbo.CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN_MICONTRACT WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID AND [MONTH_CODE] = 3 AND FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE] = @Contrac.ngMissionType) BEGIN UPDATE MCRISS.dbo.CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN_MICONTRACT SET [MISSION_VALUE] = @March, [USER_LOGIN] = @UserLogin, [UPDATE_DATE] = GetDate () WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID AND [MONTH_CODE] = 3 AND FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE] = @Contrac.ngMissionType END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO MCRISS.dbo.CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN_MICONTRACT ( [ORGANIZATION_ID], [FISCAL_YEAR], [MONTH_CODE], [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE], [MISSION_VALUE], [USER_LOGIN], [UPDATE_DATE]) VALUES (@OrgID, @FiscalYear, 3, @Contrac.ngMissionType, @March, @UserLogin, GetDate ()) END
-- April IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM MCRISS.dbo.CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN_MICONTRACT WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID AND [MONTH_CODE] = 4 AND FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE] = @Contrac.ngMissionType) BEGIN UPDATE MCRISS.dbo.CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN_MICONTRACT SET [MISSION_VALUE] = @April, [USER_LOGIN] = @UserLogin, [UPDATE_DATE] = GetDate () WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID AND [MONTH_CODE] = 4 AND FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE] = @Contrac.ngMissionType END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO MCRISS.dbo.CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN_MICONTRACT ( [ORGANIZATION_ID], [FISCAL_YEAR], [MONTH_CODE], [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE], [MISSION_VALUE], [USER_LOGIN], [UPDATE_DATE]) VALUES (@OrgID, @FiscalYear, 4, @Contrac.ngMissionType, @April, @UserLogin, GetDate ()) END
-- May IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM MCRISS.dbo.CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN_MICONTRACT WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID AND [MONTH_CODE] = 5 AND FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE] = @Contrac.ngMissionType) BEGIN UPDATE MCRISS.dbo.CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN_MICONTRACT SET [MISSION_VALUE] = @May, [USER_LOGIN] = @UserLogin, [UPDATE_DATE] = GetDate () WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID AND [MONTH_CODE] = 5 AND FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE] = @Contrac.ngMissionType END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO MCRISS.dbo.CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN_MICONTRACT ( [ORGANIZATION_ID], [FISCAL_YEAR], [MONTH_CODE], [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE], [MISSION_VALUE], [USER_LOGIN], [UPDATE_DATE]) VALUES (@OrgID, @FiscalYear, 5, @Contrac.ngMissionType, @May, @UserLogin, GetDate ()) END
-- June IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM MCRISS.dbo.CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN_MICONTRACT WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID AND [MONTH_CODE] = 6 AND FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE] = @Contrac.ngMissionType) BEGIN UPDATE MCRISS.dbo.CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN_MICONTRACT SET [MISSION_VALUE] = @June, [USER_LOGIN] = @UserLogin, [UPDATE_DATE] = GetDate () WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID AND [MONTH_CODE] = 6 AND FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE] = @Contrac.ngMissionType END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO MCRISS.dbo.CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN_MICONTRACT ( [ORGANIZATION_ID], [FISCAL_YEAR], [MONTH_CODE], [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE], [MISSION_VALUE], [USER_LOGIN], [UPDATE_DATE]) VALUES (@OrgID, @FiscalYear, 6, @Contrac.ngMissionType, @June, @UserLogin, GetDate ()) END
-- July IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM MCRISS.dbo.CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN_MICONTRACT WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID AND [MONTH_CODE] = 7 AND FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE] = @Contrac.ngMissionType) BEGIN UPDATE MCRISS.dbo.CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN_MICONTRACT SET [MISSION_VALUE] = @July, [USER_LOGIN] = @UserLogin, [UPDATE_DATE] = GetDate () WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID AND [MONTH_CODE] = 7 AND FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE] = @Contrac.ngMissionType END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO MCRISS.dbo.CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN_MICONTRACT ( [ORGANIZATION_ID], [FISCAL_YEAR], [MONTH_CODE], [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE], [MISSION_VALUE], [USER_LOGIN], [UPDATE_DATE]) VALUES (@OrgID, @FiscalYear, 7, @Contrac.ngMissionType, @July, @UserLogin, GetDate ()) END
-- August IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM MCRISS.dbo.CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN_MICONTRACT WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID AND [MONTH_CODE] = 8 AND FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE] = @Contrac.ngMissionType) BEGIN UPDATE MCRISS.dbo.CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN_MICONTRACT SET [MISSION_VALUE] = @August, [USER_LOGIN] = @UserLogin, [UPDATE_DATE] = GetDate () WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID AND [MONTH_CODE] = 8 AND FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE] = @Contrac.ngMissionType END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO MCRISS.dbo.CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN_MICONTRACT ( [ORGANIZATION_ID], [FISCAL_YEAR], [MONTH_CODE], [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE], [MISSION_VALUE], [USER_LOGIN], [UPDATE_DATE]) VALUES (@OrgID, @FiscalYear, 8, @Contrac.ngMissionType, @August, @UserLogin, GetDate ()) END
-- September IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM MCRISS.dbo.CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN_MICONTRACT WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID AND [MONTH_CODE] = 9 AND FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE] = @Contrac.ngMissionType) BEGIN UPDATE MCRISS.dbo.CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN_MICONTRACT SET [MISSION_VALUE] = @September, [USER_LOGIN] = @UserLogin, [UPDATE_DATE] = GetDate () WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID AND [MONTH_CODE] = 9 AND FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE] = @Contrac.ngMissionType END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO MCRISS.dbo.CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN_MICONTRACT ( [ORGANIZATION_ID], [FISCAL_YEAR], [MONTH_CODE], [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE], [MISSION_VALUE], [USER_LOGIN], [UPDATE_DATE]) VALUES (@OrgID, @FiscalYear, 9, @Contrac.ngMissionType, @September, @UserLogin, GetDate ()) END
-- October IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM MCRISS.dbo.CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN_MICONTRACT WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID AND [MONTH_CODE] = 10 AND FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE] = @Contrac.ngMissionType) BEGIN UPDATE MCRISS.dbo.CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN_MICONTRACT SET [MISSION_VALUE] = @October, [USER_LOGIN] = @UserLogin, [UPDATE_DATE] = GetDate () WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID AND [MONTH_CODE] = 10 AND FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE] = @Contrac.ngMissionType END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO MCRISS.dbo.CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN_MICONTRACT ( [ORGANIZATION_ID], [FISCAL_YEAR], [MONTH_CODE], [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE], [MISSION_VALUE], [USER_LOGIN], [UPDATE_DATE]) VALUES (@OrgID, @FiscalYear, 10, @Contrac.ngMissionType, @October, @UserLogin, GetDate ()) END
-- November IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM MCRISS.dbo.CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN_MICONTRACT WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID AND [MONTH_CODE] = 11 AND FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE] = @Contrac.ngMissionType) BEGIN UPDATE MCRISS.dbo.CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN_MICONTRACT SET [MISSION_VALUE] = @November, [USER_LOGIN] = @UserLogin, [UPDATE_DATE] = GetDate () WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID AND [MONTH_CODE] = 11 AND FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE] = @Contrac.ngMissionType END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO MCRISS.dbo.CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN_MICONTRACT ( [ORGANIZATION_ID], [FISCAL_YEAR], [MONTH_CODE], [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE], [MISSION_VALUE], [USER_LOGIN], [UPDATE_DATE]) VALUES (@OrgID, @FiscalYear, 11, @Contrac.ngMissionType, @November, @UserLogin, GetDate ()) END
-- December IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM MCRISS.dbo.CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN_MICONTRACT WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID AND [MONTH_CODE] = 12 AND FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE] = @Contrac.ngMissionType) BEGIN UPDATE MCRISS.dbo.CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN_MICONTRACT SET [MISSION_VALUE] = @December, [USER_LOGIN] = @UserLogin, [UPDATE_DATE] = GetDate () WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID AND [MONTH_CODE] = 12 AND FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE] = @Contrac.ngMissionType END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO MCRISS.dbo.CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN_MICONTRACT ( [ORGANIZATION_ID], [FISCAL_YEAR], [MONTH_CODE], [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE], [MISSION_VALUE], [USER_LOGIN], [UPDATE_DATE]) VALUES (@OrgID, @FiscalYear, 12, @Contrac.ngMissionType, @December, @UserLogin, GetDate ()) END
